Quarter-Pounder Cheese
■This shows the
fully assembled
sandwich.

Procedure
■Put toasted quarter-pounder
buns in the special box.

Procedure
■Put the crown
on its toasted
side and the
heel next to
it cut-side-up.

Procedure
■Hit the crown
with a shot of
mustard.

Procedure
■Hit it with a
15mL shot of
ketchup.

Procedure
■Put 7g/0.2oz
of onions on
the ketchup.

Procedure
■Put 2 pickles
on top of the
onions so 
they do not
overlap.

Procedure
■Put one slice of
cheese on the
heel and one on
the pickles.

Procedure
■Put 2 1/14th
patties on top
of the cheese
on the crown.

Procedure
■Lift up the
top 1/4th patty
and put a slice
of cheese there.

Procedure
■Put the 2nd
1/4th patty on
the newly-
placed cheese.

Procedure
■Put the heel
side on top
of the crown
side.

Procedure
■Close the box from the heel
side.

Procedure
■Turn the box upside-down and
slide it down the HLZ.
